content.description:
Climbs the pillar like feature in the middle of the wall. A boulder problem start gets you to the first bolt, turn the roof (possible beached whale move) and continue up the overlaps to the coldshuts.

A variation drifts left at 3/4 height to a vertical crack system, be sure to use long runners if you go this way.
content.protection: 1 bolt, pro to 3 1/2" with extra small cams for the numerous horizontal seams.
content.location: Middle of the wall, find the overhang with a rectangular boulder laying at the base.

content.description: Climb the tallest, best section of gator skin on the wall. Solid, clean horizontals down low give way to thinner crimps & seams up high.
content.location: On the left (east) end of the wall, start at the base of a bushy, right-facing dihedral.

content.description: Start at the base of a large flake. Follow the left-angling crack, then take the right diagonal crack to a slab and bolt anchors above.
content.protection: A standard rack to a #2; a #3 is optional.
content.location: This is located on the far right side of Cat Scratch Wall, to the right of 'Scale Me'.

content.description: Start right of Gargoyle, at the far right of a slab step. Climb over a short roof to a jug haul, traversing diagonally left to the anchors for Gargoyle and Gargantuan
content.protection: There are anchors at the top.

content.description: Climb past a lone bolt and a low crux leading to a series of horizontals that take you to a ledge. Follow a crack up & left through a bulge to easier ground and the anchors.
content.protection: One bolt, pro to 2 1/2", small (1/2" - 1" range) cams are essential for the tricky horizontal pods after the first bolt, 2 bolt anchor.
content.location:
This is the second route from the left end of the wall, start 10' right of

Reptillian Hairball

.
